EmailTemplate.name: Aero MSPAvionics Renewal 30days
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required: MSP Avionics/Mechanical Components Renewal due soon.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
As notified previously your MSP Avionics/Mechanical Contract 4400XXXXX expiration date is approaching and after XX.XX.20XX you will no longer have coverage.
If you have not started the below steps please do so at this time.
Resolve any questions or concerns related to contract coverage Review new features/options available for each plan Send a fully executed copy of the contract If helpful to your process, provide PO to Honeywell Advise if aircraft is sold or otherwise not flying
Important Pricing Info â€“ If your contract is not renewed by the expiration date it will be subject to current year pricing.
Thank you for doing business with us, your case tracking number for this renewal is provided above. You may reply to this email - please leave the reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
To access our Portal and view contracts click on any of these options: Register, Reset Password, Tool Access
Kind regards,
__________________Q Honeywell
MSP Avionics & Mechanical Contract Administration MSPAvionics@honeywell.com
